review: There are not enough words to describe how thankful my Husband  and I are for your wonderful care during my pregnancy and delivery. You have a special gift as a surgeon and as a personMy first  delivery was in Gurgaon and I was a little worried about the whole process for my second pregnancy.. She has been so patient and extremely supportive , always available on calls even late at night.. I would highly recommend Dr Monica for any gynae issues..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr Monika for my 1st pregnancy. I had a very complicated pregnancy with issues like cervical polyp followed by cervical cerclage due to short cervix length. I also had gestational diabetes and was losing weight throughout the pregnancy. But with with all these complications, I had a normal delivery at 37w and the baby is completely fine. All of this was possible due to Dr. Monika’s healthcare. She treated and guided me very well throughout my journey and help aid all my issues. She is very friendly, calm and patiently listens to all my problems. She takes the time to explain all the details about any problems. The best thing about her is that she was always available on phone or in person whenever needed and that is the most important thing when you need doctor in any emergency situation. Even for my delivery she immediately attended me even when it was past midnight. I am very thankful to her helping me sail through this difficult pregnancy journey. I would highly recommend her to anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My wife and I have visited/consulted and availed the expertise of Dr. Monika for over 15 odd months now, so I feel I have the right amount of experience of recommending her with full confidence to anyone having any sort of concerns in her area if specialization.

Monika is an extremely capable doctor, highly proactive to one's medical needs, easily accessible and with a very patient demeanor which has always put us at ease no matter how worried we were when we went to meet her. Her diagnoses in our case has always been spot on and her choice of medication has also worked perfectly for us. She has also endeavored to create an ecosystem with Youtube channel, pregnancy exercise guidance, pregnancy nutrition workshops, etc.

Her clinic is also very well located and, while money is secondary when it comes to health, I would consider her fees to be very reasonable considering the niche and market she works in.

I highly recommend her if you are looking for someone with her specialization in Mumbai. I thank Dr. Monika for her invaluable services and wish her all the best going forward.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: 1) Prior to visiting Dr. Monika Agrawal I was consulting with another highly rated doctor almost for two years. However I could not get the desired result. 2) My family Doctor recommended me to visit Dr. Monika and to which I agreed. This is where the things changed for me. 3) In 4 months Doctor not only helped me to overcome my health issues but also she made my dream come true. YES! I am expecting my first Baby in 2021. 4) I wish I would have started the treatment in 2019 when I met Dr. Monika for the first time. I did not persue my treatment because I was quite reluctant to move away from my 1st Doctor. 5) I am glad that I took the right decision of getting myself treated / cured by Dr. Monika. 6)What makes Dr. Monika unique is her confidence, the subject knowledge that she transfers to the patient and the family, I have never seen her running out of time when she is addressing the patient queries. There are lot more positive things which cannot be expressed in a word and one has to visit the doctor to experience this.  7)I highly recommend Dr. Monika Agrawal to all those ladies who has been struggling to conceive and other female health related problems. 8) Thank you Doctor for all what you did for me. I appreciate it.
reply_text: Thanks Sangeeta for the kind words. I am glad I could help you in achieving your dreams....

review: Myself Sonika and am so blessed to have Dr.Monika Agarwal ..I was having pcos and trying to get pregnant since 4years of marriage but didn't work anything..Also tried with so many gynaecologist and even ayurvedic but nothing worked. After lot of search i found Dr.Monika madam  and guess what after visiting her i was so confident that one day i will be blessed with a phase of pregnancy..She started my treatment gave proper guidance with positivity and anytime she is available for her patients that's most important..She is the best and calm ..I really thnk her for always guiding and supporting me throughout the treatment because of her i have got this happiness..May God bless her and i suggest all the ladies who are trying to get pregnant but no results pls visit her .Thank u thnk from the bottom of my heart❤️❤️🥰🥰❣️😍😍😍😍

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I would like to describe Dr . Monika Agrawal as an angel and guardian who arrived on time for my whole pregnancy and delivery journey.

It all began from me checking for best reviewed doc in jb nagar area. I found Dr. Monikas name and had an intuition to visit this doc itself. many of my relatives and neighbours suggested and forced to go to some  over experienced /aged docs. but i was determined tht i shall consult dr. monika only.

My intuitions didnt go wrong. she is the best and new gen  gynaecologist one can get . Her positive attitude, friendly nature and willingness to answer any of your queries is highly appreciated. she is anytime available for her patients over call and WhatsApp. 

Though there were some minor issues in my delivery, Dr. Monika handled it very efficiently in no time. I, my husband and whole family express our sincere gratitude to Dr. monika bcoz of whom today we have our baby boy.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: I chanced upon Dr Monika Agrawal when looking for a gynecologist near my area. From the very first appointment Dr. Monika made me feel extremely comfortable. Later when it came to be known that I was facing a medical complication, her timely diagnosis and quick decision in recommending an immediate surgical intervention averted what could have been fatal. It is apparent that doctor Monika values her patients; from the fact that she took a keen interest in explaining at length everything my family and I needed to know about my condition, and clearing any doubts we had regarding the same. I am much grateful to Dr. Monika and would recommend her to anyone without any hesitation.
reply_text: Thanks for the kind words Anisha!

tags: None
review:
The doctor was pitching mostly for IVF.
I believe it has become a norm now. Doctors pitch for IVF and IUI then putting efforts in helping patients to Conceive naturally.
reply_text: If I am not wrong I had consulted you for more than 1 hour, took your detailed history, examined you in detail and then given options to you. Since you already had frozen embryos any wise person would have advised to use them. Since you were not keen then option of IUI was given considering your past obstetric history. Imagine, why I will pitch for IVF when I am not into IVF treatment, because that was what best for you. I would still prefer to give a right advise rather than just saying  what you wish  to hear. All the best and take care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

We are so very thankful to our doctor who gave us so much of support in the journey she never fed up answering our silly questions too. ☺️ 

The doctor is very kind and helpful and has really good experience which helped us overcome our all troubles And we had a great journey of 9 months 

Thanks a lot doctor Monica Agraval

reply_text:
Hello Priyanka Jadhav,
I don’t know on what basis you made out that I was not friendly. First of all, you visited us for a problem which was not related to gynaec. Still we listened to all your issues, gave you suitable medicines for your problem and advised you to visit a surgeon in case there is no relief. If suggesting you the right treatment and guiding you with diet to prevent recurrence is gyan than we are very sorry to waste yours as well as ours precious time. Hope you find a suitable and friendly doctor soon. All the best👍

review: *** ****** ** **** ************* ** *** **** *** prescribes medicines ***** ******** ***** first visit she gave a **** dose to see the reaction then second visit she gave me ****** dose and then PCOD concern was also addressed with the medicines she gave. tags: Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ******* ***** in weeks time infection was gone, however I was not happy about the extremely expensive test **** *********** ********** ******* there was no proper system generated invoice was given. One kaccha receipt is given only after asking to give that too doesn’t have GST details 

Also follow up fees felt unnecessary as only reports were handed over to me. 

Consultation fee mentioned on the Practo is not correct 

Also, wait time is more than an hour.
reply_text: The test was not enforced one. We give option to each and every patient. If u don’t feel the need then you have the option of refusing even after collecting the sample. If u wish to have a generated invoice you have to ask for it as we can’t give that to each and every patient. Also for test we don’t need GST number. In the follow up visit you were checked for any infection and were given treatment accordingly. Also you have arrived 1 hour before ur appointment time so obviously you will have to wait.

review: she is very helpful, easily accessible whenever i face health problem in pregnancy,her nature is friendly , comfortable , she keep all the step by step information , quick respond, care for patients, she is kind lady and good doctor, i would surely recommend her to my relatives and friends who is looking for gynecologist treatment, and would give her 5 rating for treatment and care.

tags: Wait time,
review: We waited for some time and requested to know the no. of patients before us. we were told 2 were in wait. Then after half hour of wait, we were again told that 2 more patients are waiting before us. They were follow ups and we were coming for the first time. It was disingenuous. But the main issue was the unbearable atmosphere in the waiting room. They had A/C switched off and it became really uncomfortable. So we were forced to leave early without visit.
reply_text: We expect our patients to come 10 mins prior to there appointment and half an hour of waiting may be expected as we believe in complete satisfaction of our patients. Since u came 45 mins before your scheduled appointment you had to wait as all the patients had there appointments marked before you and it was going as per sequence. Since the weather was pleasant the AC was off but we would have definitely switched it on, if you would have asked for it. Still we regret the inconvenience caused to you.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Agrawal and her team worked efficiently for patient's welfare and explained things patiently and well.  Criticare (Andheri East) Hospital seems well equipped but will benefit if it pays more attention to customer care and increases staff strength and improves staff training.  Even if some adjustment is always needed because number of patients is high and staff will be overstretched, a little more professional care on hospital's behalf will go a long way.
reply_text: Thanks Vidya for the feedback. Will surely discuss this with the criticare administrators.

reply_text: Thanks for your feedback dear.  We keep branded medicines which are better then local ones hence you may find the difference.  Although the profit is negligible still we always give  5-10% discount depending on the medicines and we never force our patients to take from our clinic. So it’s completely patients  choice.
